programme.title: Our Dreams in Jiangsu, Hongkong & Macau Ep5
programme.desc: The program explores the interconnectedness and interdependence between Jiangsu, Hong Kong, and Macau. It records the inspiring stories of ambitious young individuals pursuing their dreams and showcasing their journeys of success and highlighting the strong bonds between these regions.

programme.title: The Grand Canal: China and its Wondrous Waterway
programme.desc: The Grand Canal: China and its Wondrous Waterway

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: Fantastic Journey Ep3
programme.desc: Two humorous "uncles," Meng Fei and Liu Zhenyun, reunite as old friends and join forces with their special friends," Zhang Yanqi and Grace Lee, for an intergenerational exchange journey. They explore new travel styles, visiting Hulunbuir, Chengdu, Nanjing, Kunshan, Dali, and more, meeting special guests and visiting must-see places.

programme.title: Informal Talks Season 8 Ep1
programme.desc: It is a cultural talk show where four hosts, Ryan Zuo, Di Yang, Ming Chen, and Cynthia Chan, along with 11 young representatives from different countries, come together. With a humorous and playful approach, they promote cultural exchange between China and the world, discussing social topics and customs from various countries.

programme.title: 2016-2017 Jiangsu Count Down Concert
programme.desc: 2016-2017 Jiangsu Count Down Concert

programme.title: Study On The Island Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The bookstore is located in the healing Dong'ao Island of Zhuhai; it mainly focuses on the relationship between a certain emotion and literature in people's daily life; through the dialogue and exchange of "bookstore managers", which spiritual healing is obtained from it.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep39
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: Camping Life Season 2 Ep7
programme.desc: The initiator William Chan invited his friends, Wei Daxun, Lil Ghost, Di Yang, Yin Zheng & Zhang Yanqi, to complete 5 themed camps with building different kind of ideal life portraits.

programme.title: Talk To Your Boss: Friends Season Ep5
programme.desc: The show undergoes a new upgrade with the theme "Friends Season," focusing the observation samples on workplace comrades with stronger emotions and deeper bonds. It explores complex solutions to workplace issues through the lens of veteran co-workers.

programme.title: Rendezvous with the Grand Canal Ep4
programme.desc: Intangible cultural heritage seekers follow the cultural context of the canal, exploring a city, meeting a creative inheritor of intangible cultural heritage, and sharing an enduring story of the canal. It showcases the beauty of craftsmanship, intangible cultural heritage, and local culture along the Grand Canal in Jiangsu Province.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep14
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Tour With Classics – A Poetic Journey In China Ep2
programme.desc: Taking the poetry and geography as a clue, the program explores the poetic landscapes, traditional buildings, and humanity depicted in the Chinese classic poems. Lets take the poetry as a window to understand China.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep285286
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2793
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1020
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep102
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep243244
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep477
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home(M) Ep34
programme.desc: Every one of them showed up in this house with some sort of lacking until they've met Mommy Hsiao-Li. Although they are not biologicap related, they Stay with each other like a real family.

programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep102
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1020
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep30
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep892893
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep702
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep478
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep3637
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kongs greatest filmmakers. It traces Huis life story and her 40-year careers ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Societys conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every clients needs. When Ah Kams ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy about a murdered cop returning from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie (Chow) into avenging his death.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugos enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugos enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: Devi 2
programme.desc: Tamil horror comedy film, Tamanna, Nanditha, Prabhu Deva, Kovai Sarala, RJ Balaji & Others

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: action - masala Tamil film starring Vishal Krishna and Aishwarya Arjun, Santhanam
Tamil Science fiction Action Film, Starring, Rajinikanth, Akshay Kumar, Amy Jackson, Adil Hussain, Sudhanshu Pandey & Others

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Tamil Action Romantic Movie, Starring, Jiiva, Nayanatara, Gopinath, Meenakshi,Sharath

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, M. Sasikumar, Shamna Kasim, Mahima Nambiar, Sanusha, Inder Kumar & Others

programme.title: Tripura
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Swathi Reddy, Saptagiri, Rao Ramesh, Naveen Chandra

programme.title: Anandam Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: Tamil Action Drama Film, starring Cheran, Saravanan, Gautham Karthik, Daniel Balaji & Others

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Ka Pe Ranasingam
programme.desc: Tamil political-drama movie, starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Munishkanth, and Vela Ramamoorthy

programme.title: Biscoth
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Santhanam, Tara Alisha, Sowcar Janaki, Anandaraj, Motta Rajendran and Aadukalam Naren

programme.title: Vetrivel
programme.desc: Tamil Love, Action Movie, Starring, Sasikumar, Nikhila Vimal, Miya George, Prabhu, Thambi Ramaiah & Others

programme.title: Charlie 777
programme.desc: Tamil adventure comedy drama film, starring - Charlie, Rakshit Shetty, Sangeetha Sringeri, Raj B. Shetty, Danish Sait & Bobby Simha

programme.title: Marainthu Irunthu Paarkum Marmam Enna
programme.desc: Tamil female-centric drama thriller film, Starring, Dhruva; Aishwarya Dutta; Saranya P

programme.title: Periya Kudumbam
programme.desc: Tamil Family drama film, Starring - Prabhu, Kanaka & Vineetha

programme.title: Terminator 3 - Rise Of Machines
programme.desc: Hollywood Science Fiction Action Film, Starring - Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes & Kristanna Loken

programme.title: Valayam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller film, Starring - Laksh Chadalavada, Sri Sudha, Ravi Prakash & Digangana Suryavanshi

programme.title: Dora

programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who cant move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wifes body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafas life.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: Ricky
programme.desc: When Katie, an ordinary woman, meets Paco, an ordinary man, something magical and miraculous happens: a love story. From this union will be born an extraordinary baby: Ricky.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: After the death of their father and mother, four siblings reunite to come to terms with the tragedy. They decide to participate in a hunting challenge which will determine their inheritance.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.desc: Starring Tom Hiddleston (Thor) and newcomer Kathryn Worth, Unrelated is a terse and gripping psychodrama that focuses on a childless Anna whos dissatisfied with her marriage. She soon falls for another man but her demons soon return to haunt her.

programme.title: Cloves & Carnations
programme.desc: In snowy and desolate South Eastern Anatolian, Musa carries the corpse of his deceased wife to their homeland with his granddaughter. As they get closer to a country at war, their run-in with the police separates them in different directions.

programme.title: Strawberry Days
programme.desc: A young Polish farmworker falls in love with the farm owners Swedish daughter. Hes poor and exploited while shes privileged and rich. Their tender love threatens to be foiled when a violent confrontation erupts between their respective communities.

programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the nights end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Strawberry Days
programme.desc: A young Polish farmworker falls in love with the farm owners Swedish daughter. Hes poor and exploited while shes privileged and rich. Their tender love threatens to be foiled when a violent confrontation erupts between their respective communities.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: Sebbe
programme.desc: Sebbe is fifteen. He never planned to build a bomb but now, he has one in his hands. Growing up poor and with a single mother, life had always been difficult. The junkyard soon became his place of refuge where he could detach himself from the world.

programme.title: Cherating Syndrome
programme.desc: After a confusing breakup, Alisha decides to go on a trip to Cherating to figure out whether her relationship is worth fighting for. There, she meets a local stranger who offers her a tour around Cherating which changes her perspective on life.

programme.title: Summer Rebels
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: Notorious mobster "Whitey" Bulger collaborates with the FBI to eliminate a common enemy: the Italian mob. As their unholy alliance spirals out of control, Whitey becomes one of the most ruthless and powerful gangsters in Boston history.

programme.desc: The Hunt heats up and Mary and John find trails that lead back to their fathers. Carlos and Mary discover more than they bargained for. Millie steps in to help.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 10
programme.desc: While Carlos talks through a personal problem, it gives Latika a new idea, which leads to an unexpected ally.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 16
programme.desc: At a cell phone store, Michael reveals an exciting new way to fix your tablet, and later, he makes a drink that's impossible to swallow. Plus, a dog owner loves that Michael has turned her pet into the smartest animal in the world.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 17
programme.desc: Michael turns leftovers into beauty products at a soap shop, and at a record store, he shows a hip-hop fan how to jump around. Plus, at a children's store, Michael's co-worker learns about the dangers of babysitting.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 1
programme.desc: Michael shocks a receptionist with a medical procedure that leaves both their jaws on the floor, and then at a party store, Michael reveals a regenerating piece of gum. Plus, an electrifying trick rewrites history.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 2
programme.desc: At a library, Michael shocks people with every trick in the book, including a voice-controlled page-turner and outfit changes that almost get him recognized! And later, Michael amazes a trainee with a weightless mattress!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 3
programme.desc: At a ski shop, Michael demonstrates the latest in winter gear: a hat that also makes hot cocoa. And later, when taking inventory at an abandoned garage, Michael stuns his co-worker when a ghostly violin strikes a chord.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: Offering a new take on J.M. Barrie's classic story of a flying boy who never ages, acclaimed British director Joe Wright reimagines the ageless tale for audiences worldwide. Set during World War II, the story follows the orphaned Peter, who's kidnapped by pirates and brought to the magical Neverland, where he finds both fun and dangers and ultimately discovers his destiny to free the land from the pirate Blackbeard and become the hero who will forever be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug drives to Las Vegas with his best buddies Phil and Stu and his future brother-in-law Alan, for a blow-out bachelor party they vow they'll never forget. But when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning with pounding headaches, they can't remember a thing. Their luxury hotel suite is beyond trashed and the groom is nowhere to be found. With no clue about what happened and little time to spare, the trio must attempt to retrace their bad decisions from the night before in order to figure out where things went wrong in the hopes of finding Doug and getting him back to L.A. in time for his wedding. But the more they begin to uncover, the more they realize just how much trouble they're really in.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 5
programme.desc: After returning from Boston for his 50th birthday, Mark makes a decision about his future with Flecha Azul tequila.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 8

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 9
programme.desc: While screening his new film in Iowa, Mark gets caught in a tornado. Later, Mark is informed about a glitch on Municipals website during their womens line launch.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 20
programme.desc: While Penny and Bernadette improvise a bachelorette party for Amy, Sheldon and the guys visit a reclusive scientist in his cabin in the middle of nowhere.

programme.desc: Writer NEIL GAIMAN puts Stuart's comic book store on the map.Meanwhile, friendships are threatened when Raj takes credit for Penny's astronomical discovery.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 22
programme.desc: While Sheldon goes to Vegas to win millions of dollars for science, Penny and Bernadette take Amy shopping for wedding dresses, but get caught in a web of lies.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 1
programme.desc: At the port of Los Angeles, Uzi and Shlomi are out to destroy the competition. First, Uzi drives prices through the roof, causing complete chaos on the auction floor. Then, Shlomi plays a hunch on a mysterious container from China that has everyonein a tizzy. Will their strategy pay off?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 3
programme.desc: Things get testy when maniac Matt goes toe-to-tow with the Israelis on a container full of high end hunting equipment, and the bidding boils over when Jason tries to one-up them on a promising container from Japan.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 4

programme.desc: Cindy and her new team make their move against the JSA leading to an epic showdown.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 7
programme.desc: When the guilt over Brainwaves death becomes too much to handle, Yolanda is forced to make a heartbreaking decision.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 8
programme.desc: With his world crashing down around him, Rick focuses his attention on protecting Solomon Grundy, Beth becomes the target of Eclipsos latest plan.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 9
programme.desc: As Eclipso takes aim, Pat is reminded of painful memories from his past with the original JSA and their fight to take down Eclipso.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 10
programme.desc: Although devastated after discovering a dark secret that Pat kept hidden from her, Courtney and Pat put their issues aside to find help from Jennie.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 12
programme.desc: It's hats off for Murr, Sal, Q and Joe when they work as cap salesmen. Then, the guys head to Joey Fatone's hot dog joint to serve confused customers. And the loser performs a stand-up comedy routine but barely gets out alive.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: The guys head to Orlando, where they are out of line with theme park guests, get wet on a river adventure and manage the (mis)information booth. Plus, the loser goes from spider hero to barnyard zero.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q say aloha in a fun Hawaiian episode! The future looks hazy when the guys pose as fortune tellers and practice indecent proposals at a romantic waterfall. Plus, it's blood in the water for the big loser.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: Going In Style (2017)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin team up as lifelong buddies Willie, Joe and Al, who decide to buck retirement and step off the straight-and-narrow for the first time in their lives when their pension fund becomes a corporate casualty, in director Zach Braff's comedy Going In Style. Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, the three risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honorable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organized crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armored suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Valerie is a beautiful young woman torn between two men. She is in love with a brooding outsider Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry the wealthy Henry. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter are planning to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by the werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Father Solomon, a famous werewolf hunter, warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them. As the death toll rises with each moon, Valerie begins to suspect that the werewolf could be someone she loves. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Ready for another round? In the follow-up to the record-breaking hit comedy, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stu (Ed Helms), Alan (Zach Galifianakis) and Doug (Justin Bartha) travel to exotic Thailand for Stu's wedding. After Doug's now-unforgettable Las Vegas bachelor party, Stu is not taking any chances and has opted for a safe and subdued pre-wedding brunch. Things don't always go as planned however. What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in Bangkok can't even be imagined think monkeys, tattoos and the return of Mr. Chow! Acclaimed comedy filmmaker Todd Phillips reunites with his comic quartet of over-indulged stars for another globe-trotting howl at the moon with the "Wolfpack."

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves
programme.desc: Kevin Costner is the legendary swashbuckling hero of Englands Sherwood Forest who defends the poor and battles Alan Rickmans deliciously evil Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: The Serpent's Kiss
programme.desc: In England, during the 17th-century, a Dutch garden architect (Ewan McGregor, "Moulin Rouge!") is drawn into a web of passion and treachery after being hired by a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: The Last Of The Mohicans
programme.desc: A budding romance between a British officer's daughter and an independent man who was reared as a Mohawk complicates things for the British officer, as the adopted Mohawk pursues his own agenda despite the wrath of different people.

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery: A Robber's Tale
programme.desc: Chief Superintendent Tommy Butler assembles a team to try to take down Reynolds and his gang. The discovery of a suitcase containing stolen notes leads to the first arrest whilst a tip-off takes Butler to the farmhouse HQ and a mass of forensic evidence.

programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Final Shot
programme.desc: Retired hitman, Frank, known as The Silencer wants to lead a normal life with his new girlfriend and her daughter but is unwillingly brought back into the game when a mafia mob boss wants him to avenge the death of his young daughter

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Zanzibar & Jordan - The last leg of Joanna Lumley's journey takes her by dhow to Zanzibar, the spice island of Africa where merchants from around the world have left their mark on the architecture, religion and music.

programme.title: The Last Overland S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Best Laid Plans - Meet 87 year old Tim Slessor, the British adventurer plotting his last great adventure: recreating his epic 1955 expedition - 'First Overland: London to Singapore' - which a young David Attenborough commissioned for the BBC.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep9
programme.desc: A single sturgeon can produce a bowl of sustainable caviar worth $12,000; a shepherd's pie puts a modern twist on Mom's classic recipe; a family business rolls out nine million risotto balls every year; and discover the secret to making decadent ice wine truffles.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep10
programme.desc: See how the cheese met the peanut butter in this legendary sandwich snack; get the scoop on two-toned frozen fruit bars from Florida; 1.5 million blueberry dumplings are produced in just one shift; and it takes a mountain of super-food to make tantalizing kale chips.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Virtual Assistants - Hannah Fry delves into the inner workings of virtual assistants, such as Amazon's Alexa, Google Assistant and Siri, which are now found in almost half of all UK homes.

programme.title: Secrets of the Jurassic Dinosaurs S1 Ep1
programme.desc: An international team of palaeontologists in the remote badlands of Wyoming investigate a mysterious dinosaur graveyard. Packed with over a dozen skeletons including predators such as the fearsome Allosaurus and iconic giants like Diplodocus, as well as fossilised plants and footprints.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Zanzibar & Jordan - The last leg of Joanna Lumley's journey takes her by dhow to Zanzibar, the spice island of Africa where merchants from around the world have left their mark on the architecture, religion and music.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Melt-in-your-mouth chocolate mints are lovingly finished by hand. In a unique antipasto, the star ingredient goes from field to jar all on the same day; Aussie-style soft licorice owes its success to a blunder Down Under; and find out the secret to making perfectly seasoned plantain chips.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Peanut butter cups feature an amazing history and a one-of-a-kind butterscotch coating; starting with giant slabs of butter, three million Sara Lee pound cakes are produced every year; three types of citrus go from tree to jar at this Florida orchard; and a butter chicken cooking sauce is made at a university research facility.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A New Perspective - From space, we follow elephants struggling through drought, reveal unknown penguin colonies from the colour of their faeces, and discover strange ice rings that could endanger seals.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Martin travels to Guam to see the effect of invasive species on remote islands; discovering animals and humans driven to the edge of extinction. In Palau he meets the endangered Hawksbill Turtle and rare Dugong, learning more about this tiny island's work in world-leading marine conservation.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep7
programme.desc: In California, it's a vacation from hell as hundreds of campers flee a rampaging wildfire. A rare tornado crashes through the Czech Republic and its sink or swim for a solo adventurer as he attempts to row the perilous Pacific.

programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Catch Me if You Can - Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ugly - Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Vietnam: the Journey's End - The Mekong Delta is one of the largest on Earth. Formed over the last 8000 years, it fans out and discharges into the South China Sea via nine channels. These channels split and shape the coastline, creating unique habitats for a variety of animals.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Mating Game - Meet Madonna, a very special monkey. Shes the first Kinda baboon ever to be studied from birth to adulthood and now, critically, shes looking for a mate. Only recently identified as a species in their own right, Kinda baboons are little known and little understood. But Madonna is helping change all that. She may just hold the key to unlocking the secrets of the Kindas unique female-male relationships. These are baboons like no others.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque - In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Icelands volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble - Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep11
programme.desc: Loners - Sidle up to lone wolf alphas whod rather go solo. Take a glacial stroll alongside a Galpagos tortoise; dance with venomous European adders; watch a face-tearing battle between Lacerta lizards; and gasp at leopard seals amazing stealth attacks.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Forests - Australia is home to the world's most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it's a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can bite, poison or maim.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wetlands - As water flows from Australia's highlands into the seas, an assortment of environmental niches set the stage for multifaceted interactions between predators and their prey.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Deserts - Behind the facade of Australias dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Oceans - Australia is home to the worlds most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, its a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can envenomate, poison or maim.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Monkey Garden - At the southern edge of the Pantanal, the worlds largest tropical wetland on Earth, theres a placelike no other, and a wildlife so diverse scientists scramble to understand the variety of ways animals interact with each other. The highlands of the Bodoquena Hills are the entrance to the murky wetlands of the Pantanal. Here, the waters are crystal clear, filtered by a limestone formation over 600 million year old, that offers a clear window into the life of these streams. Waterfalls, tufa dams, caves and pristine rivers with a visibility of up to fifty meters abound.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bird Paradise - Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Peccary Party - In the heart of the Pantanal wetlands, theres a region so remote very few humans ever get there.The lack of human interaction makes this the perfect habitat for a thunderous herd of three hundred white-lipped peccaries. These large pig-like mammals grow up to forty five kilos and have stripes of white hair underneath their chin which gives them their distinctive appearance and name.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jaguar Den - In the heart of Brazil, the largest cat in the Americas, the magnificent jaguar, reigns over a magical land filled with natural beauty and diversity.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cat Country - In many countries the vulnerable and elusive ocelot is on the Endangered Species List. But on the southern edge of the Pantanal, one of the worlds largest tropical wetlands, this magnificent wild cat seems to be making a comeback. A team of young wildlife scientists is trying to understand why.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Osprey: Sea Raptor - Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep11
programme.desc: Loners - Sidle up to lone wolf alphas whod rather go solo. Take a glacial stroll alongside a Galpagos tortoise; dance with venomous European adders; watch a face-tearing battle between Lacerta lizards; and gasp at leopard seals amazing stealth attacks.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Emerald Season - Its the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep2
programme.desc: After the Rains - As the dry season takes hold in Zambia's Luangwa Valley, lagoons will start to dry-up and verdant grasslands will gradually turn to dust. Animals must make the most of the wet seasons legacy whilst they can.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep1

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Kingdom of the Tide - Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Chatty/Communicative - Connect with Earths most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely dont take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters chilling screams; face angry fruit bats loud complaints; and explore orcas human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Lost Boy - Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweeping Shores - The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sanctuary of the Indian Ocean - On Africa's east coast, the warm Agulhas run south with a distinctive subtropical landscape. Made up of everything from mangrove swamps to colorful coral reefs, the area has marine turtles - who breed on long and warm sandy beaches - and a recently found population of "living fossils", the Coelacanth, which dwell in deep, submarine canyons.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Golden Forest - This is the story of the Golden Forest, the vast expanses of kelp that lines Africas southwestern shore. Fed by an upwelling of nutrients from deep in the Atlantic, the kelp forest nurtures four distinct worlds.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Algoa Bay: Last Refuge of the African Penguin - The population of African penguins in Southern Africa is on the decline, but the charismatic species has found a stronghold on two islands in Algoa Bay. This is the story of the penguins daily struggle to raise families in an unforgiving and hostile environment.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep6
programme.desc: To the Rescue - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep2
programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Estis leg infection puts the brakes on this young duikers release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers dogs.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arid Heart - From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts gives us the gorgeous escapism of Christmas with quick and easy recipes that won't break the festive budget. In two episodes (The Big Day and Betwixmas), Jamie shares delicious ideas and shortcuts to create food that will be full of flavour while saving stress and time. From a foolproof roast turkey and a show-stopping veggie centrepiece to transforming leftovers (Brussels sprouts Caesar salad and a celebration cake made from a gifted panettone), Jamie has all the recipes and tips to help you enjoy this magical time of year - whether friends pop in or you stay wrapped up inside with the family.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: Christmas Specials 2021 S1 Ep2

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen S1 Ep10

programme.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom Ep1
programme.desc: Megamind: The Button Of Doom - After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos Ep1
programme.desc: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos - After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless Heart of Fire Ruby a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless Ep1
programme.desc: Scared Shrekless - Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madly Madagascar - Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.
